attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: North Yorkshire C.C has cancelled the proposed roundabout to go ahead whilst there have been so many fitalities/accidents here. At a cost of £840,000, this must be a small price to pay to save even one more life. We pay more than enough in taxes including road and fuel tax, so why are we now after years of protesting, being treat like this?

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action and not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
